alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Holt (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 5:19AM CDT until June 17 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Atchison County in northwestern Missouri... Northern Holt County in northwestern Missouri... * Until 545 AM CDT. * At 519 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Craig, or 10 miles northeast of Falls City, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mound City, Oregon, Craig, Big Lake, Fortescue, Bigelow, Corning and Indian Cave State Park. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 70 and 106. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
